interestingFact: The Great Wall of China is visible from space on rare occasions.
Petra was established as the capital of the Nabataean Kingdom.
Christ the Redeemer is the largest Art-Deco sculpture in the world.
Machu Picchu is an Incan citadel set high in the Andes Mountains.
Chichen Itza was a large pre-Columbian archaeological site built by the Maya civilization.
The Roman Colosseum is an ancient amphitheater in Rome, known for hosting gladiatorial contests.
The Taj Mahal is a white marble mausoleum in Agra, built by Mughal emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his wife Mumtaz Mahal.
